thread.title: July Superyacht Charter Fleet News from Fraser Yachts
thread.title_full: July Superyacht Charter Fleet News from Fraser Yachts - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: July Superyacht Charter Fleet News from Fraser Yachts
text:
Fraser Yachts announces the addition of M/Y ANNAEVA to their fleet of superyachts for charter
 MONACO, August 21, The month of July has seen the addition of an incredible motor yacht, M/Y ANNAEVA, to the Fraser Yachts charter fleet.
Fraser Yachts is delighted to welcome the stunning 56m M/Y ANNAEVA to their impressive charter fleet. Built by the famous Benetti shipyard in 2007 and available for charter for the first time, she has been maintained to the highest standards by her dedicated owner. M/Y ANNAEVA is the perfect yacht for a relaxing Mediterranean yacht charter holiday, with her exclusive features that include incredible deck spaces, a sundeck complete with a Jacuzzi and extensive sunbathing areas with a full serviced bar. She has the ability to accommodate twelve guests in six luxury staterooms, including a notable split level master suite and a VIP stateroom located on the Bridge Deck.
She is the ultimate holiday platform, with her expansive entertainment areas and wide selection of the latest water and yacht toys available on the market.
Charter M/Y ANNAEVA all year round starting from EUR 250,000/week.
For further information, please do not hesitate to contact a charter broker at Fraser Yachts today.
Fraser Yachts is the world's leading, full-service yachting company, and provides a professional team of yachting experts ready to support, advise and to assist you in every aspect of superyacht charter, luxury yacht sales, yacht ownership , and day-to-day operation. Visit their website at www.fraseryachts.com for further information.
